example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how a definition list can be used to describe the message levels that are generated by a monitoring application. The compact attribute instructs processors to tighten the vertical spacing.
example.codeblock: <dl compact="yes"> <dlentry> <dt>Warning</dt> <dd>Problems were detected, but the software will continue to monitor activity.</dd> </dlentry> <dlentry> <dt>Error</dt> <dd>Problems were detected, and the software is in danger of shutting down.</dd> </dlentry> <dlentry> <dt>Severe</dt> <dd>Monitoring activity has ceased.</dd> </dlentry> </dl>
